```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
prog <- read.csv("data/programming.csv")
prog <- prog[2:6] 
```

```{r}
prog <- prog %>%
  mutate()
```

```{r}
prog %>%
  filter(org %in% c("BDU", "Blue Devils United")) %>%
  arrange(desc(deny))
```

```{r}
ggplot(prog, aes(x = date, y = grant)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.3)
```

```{r}
prog %>%
  group_by(org) %>%
  summarize(deny = sum(deny), request = sum(req))
```
